name: Among Trees - Closed Pre-Alpha
description:
Among Trees is a beautiful survival simulator. Build your cabin, explore the deep forests, and live peacefully among the trees. You'll have to eat, sleep and stay warm to survive.

More details at AmongTreesGame.com

Minimum system requirements:
OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
Mid-range destkop GPU
Mid-range destkop CPU
Memory: 8 GB RAM
